sen.j: 幕府の番衆の元は鎌倉幕府の源頼朝時代に弓矢に優れた側近の御家人を日夜身辺に置いたことに由来するとされる。
sen.e: It is said that Banshu in the bakufu originally derives from the fact that during the time of MINAMOTO no Yoritomo in Kamakura bakufu, he arranged gokenins (immediate vassals of the shogunate) with high qualification in bow and arrow to stay close to him night and day.
